text: Emeryville is a small city in Alameda County, California. It is along the shore of the San Francisco Bay between Oakland and Berkeley. ==History== The Ohlone Native Americans lived here before 1776. ==Population== The 2020 United States Census said that 12,905 people lived in Emeryville. ==Schools== Emery Unified School District teaches kids in Emeryville. Its schools, both in the same site, are Anna Yates Elementary School and Emery Secondary School. German International School of Silicon Valley also has a campus. In 2018 this campus will close and become separate school,"Berkeley/East Bay ." German International School of Silicon Valley. Retrieved on March 21, 2017. called the East Bay German International School."Contact ." East Bay German International School. Retrieved on March 21, 2017. ==References== Category:Cities in California Category:Settlements in Alameda County, California Category:Cities in the San Francisco Bay Area
title: Emeryville, California
